CustomField.description: List of CampaignMember status value to automatically initialize for a newly created Campaign after default status cleaning (as a JSON List of status records). Setting values here automatically triggers cleaning.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: List of CampaignMember status value to automatically initialize for a newly created Campaign after default status cleaning (as a JSON List of status records). Setting values here automatically triggers cleaning.
CustomField.label: CM Statuses (after cleaning)
